The Los Angeles Lakers heated rivalry with the hated Boston Celtics moves to center court in Season  of the pulpy series about the birth of purpleandgold dynasty premiering August  on HBO PERIOD

Colorful playboy owner Jerry Buss John C PERIOD Reilly and his superstars  brash young buck Magic Johnson Quincy Isaiah and crusty captain Kareem AbdulJabbar Solomon Hughes  have established their fastpaced highflying brand of basketball dubbed Showtime transforming the beleaguered franchise from drab to glam and the NBA from an afterthought into a pop culture phenomenon PERIOD Now can the Lakers defend their title and establish a new dynasty The answer was no slam dunk PERIOD

Failure is difficult to deal with but success in some ways is even harder says Winning Time The Rise of the Lakes Dynasty cocreator Max Borenstein PERIOD Are you going to be a flash in the pan The challenges of truly becoming a dynasty are manifold. magics megawatt smile dims with his first serious injury and public doubts about his comeback and he must pull a rabbit out of the hat PERIOD The very thing that makes you great  the ego the drive  can also become your own worst enemy at times Borenstein says PERIOD Magic has to find a way to balance that with becoming a leader. the team grapples with internal player dissension including with veteran point guard Norm Nixon DeVaughn Nixon PERIOD Now theres celebrity to deal with PERIOD The more popular they get the more the bright lights shine Borenstein says PERIOD

Head coach Paul Westhead Jason Segel feuds with assistant Pat Riley Adrien Brody and the front office including cantankerous NBA great Jerry West Jason Clarke over strategy and player trades PERIOD Then Magic enters the fray PERIOD Westheads success begets some ego battles Borenstein says PERIOD He wants to assert his identity and Magic wants to assert his PERIOD Theres a huge clash PERIOD Its royal court drama at the highest level. meanwhile Buss works to put his franchise at the center of the culture turn it into a glitzy cash cow and cement his stars with contracts for the long haul PERIOD He was a visionary Borenstein says PERIOD He had a P.T PERIOD Barnum gumption to will something into existence and foresight into how basketball could be repackaged into not just sport but entertainment  with alluring dancers courtside celebrities and a swinging nightclub PERIOD Hes one of the great American success stories and is as responsible as anyone for the modern NBA. but the biggest hurdles in Season  which spans from  to  are the fierce faceoffs with the Celtics led by smug superstar Larry Bird Sean Patrick Small who becomes Magics enduring foil PERIOD Were going to see some of those epic battles this season Borenstein says adding that until the Lakers can defeat the Celtics in the NBA Finals theyre still considered pretenders to the throne. its Showtime

Winning Time The Rise of the Lakers Dynasty Season  Premiere Sunday August  98c HBO
